title: The Blue Sapphire
description: Julia Harburn sat on a seat in Kensington Gardens enjoying the sunshine. She was wearing a white frock and a large straw hat with a sapphire-blue ribbon which exactly matched her eyes--"a strange coincidence, as it turned out, for the blue sapphire was to have a far-reaching influence upon her life. She began to make new friends--"and enemies--"and she began to discover new strength and purpose in her own nature. This development of her character led her into strange adventures...
author: D.E. Stevenson
